title: One More Skin
body:
If you found out your favourite champion was only receiving one more skin for the rest of their time on the rift, what would you hope that skin would be?

For me....for {{champion:267}}  it would probably have to be jellyfish Nami
http://th06.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2014/006/2/b/jellyfish_nami_concept_by_fang-d717b9m.png
*Credit to artist fang on deviantart

How about for your champion, GD/Rito?
